definition: to grab/to catch/to arrest/to snatch/to scratch

sentences.english: Something, I think, that is ready to respond should we attempt to seize the Horcrux.
sentences.chinese: 我想，如果我們試圖抓取魂器，它就會做出反應。

sentences.english: But before you grab the CDs, hear this note of caution.
sentences.chinese: 但在你抓取CD之前，聽一下注意事項。

sentences.english: Recall that the search engine crawls a large set of pages in a small timeframe.
sentences.chinese: 回想到搜索引擎在短時間內抓取大量的頁面。

sentences.english: Double-click the Save Crawl left after the regional picture.
sentences.chinese: 後雙擊左鍵保存抓取區域的圖片。

sentences.english: This idea of capturing and leveraging microformats across applications is one of our favorite proposed directions for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我們看好通過應用程序抓取並利用微格式的發展方向。

sentences.english: The Boy and the FilbertsA BOY put his hand into a pitcher full of filberts .
sentences.chinese: 男孩把手伸到罐子裏抓取那裏面的楱子。

sentences.english: Grabbing information from the mind doesn't always have to be nefarious.
sentences.chinese: 從大腦中抓取信息不一定總是邪惡的。

sentences.english: Then grab the tick as close to the dog's skin as you can and pull it straight out.
sentences.chinese: 儘可能地靠近狗狗的皮膚抓取蝨子，然後直接扯出來。

sentences.english: Links must appear on crawlable, indexable pages and permanent.
sentences.chinese: 鏈接必須出現在抓取，索引的網頁和永久性的。

sentences.english: In addition, you implement a basic pagination mechanism by fetching the data page by page.
sentences.chinese: 另外，可以通過逐頁抓取數據來實現基本的分頁機制。

sentences.english: Unwrap & remove the pinkies with tweezers, be careful not to handle them & leave your own scent on them.
sentences.chinese: 使用鑷子抓取乳鼠，不要讓氣味留在你的受上。

sentences.english: Note that the row pre-fetch size has performance ramifications.
sentences.chinese: 注意行預抓取大小影響性能。

sentences.english: Data is fetched on demand as you display new pages.
sentences.chinese: 在顯示新的頁面時隨需抓取數據。

sentences.english: This time you're grabbing the localized strings from your localized implementation of the interface.
sentences.chinese: 這一次是從接口的本地化實現中抓取本地化字符串。

sentences.english: Abrupt, food of capture of table of pop-up of a cat, do so that soup juice ins disorder.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，一隻貓跳上桌子抓取食物，弄得湯汁狼藉。

sentences.english: Opposable thumbs also allow us to grab and pick up things.
sentences.chinese: 對生拇指還能夠完成抓取和撿起的動作。

definition: to cut off a section of sth
to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
to parse/analysis processing/to analyze and treat
